General.Name: Spacenet Enterprises India Limited
General.Description: Spacenet Enterprises India Limited primarily engages in the trading of commodities in India. It also offers information technology related services; develops software tools and platforms for commodities trading tools; and offers TradFi solutions for structured trade and commodity markets. The company was formerly known as Northgate Com Tech Limited and changed its name to Spacenet Enterprises India Limited in November 2015. Spacenet Enterprises India Limited was incorporated in 2010 and is based in Hyderabad, India.
General.Address: Plot No.114, Survey No.66/2, Hyderabad, India, 500008
